TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit KeyReference extends System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedReference
Public NotInheritable Class KeyReference Inherits EncryptedReference

summary.span: 代表 XML 加密中所使用的 項目。

span.span: Represents the element used in XML encryption.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別代表``元素，其中包含已加密的金鑰位置相關資訊。The class represents the `` element that contains information about the location of an encrypted key. 使用``指的項目``使用封入中所定義的索引鍵的項目``項目。Use the `` element to refer to `` elements that were encrypted using the key defined in the enclosing `` element. 您可以使用多個``項目時多個``項目存在，會使用相同的金鑰加密。You can use multiple `` elements when multiple `` elements exist that are encrypted using the same key. 您可以包含其他資訊，例如 XPath 轉換、 解壓縮轉換或如何擷取項目從文件儲存體設備，以協助解密的應用程式的相關資訊。You can include additional information such as XPath transforms, decompression transforms, or information about how to retrieve the elements from a document storage facility to aid the decrypting application. 如需 XML 加密標準的詳細資訊，請參閱 XML 加密規格，可 World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 在從http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/。For more information about XML encryption standards, see the XML Encryption specification, which is available from the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) at http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用時加密 XML 文件的物件。The following code example demonstrates how to use a object while encrypting an XML document. [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Keyreference#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Keyreference/cs/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Keyreference#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Keyreference/vb/sample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式建立的新執行個體類別，表示``項目。This constructor creates a new instance of the class that represents the `` element. `` 項目是 `` 項目的子項目。The `` element is a child element of the `` element. 如需 XML 加密標準的詳細資訊，請參閱 XML 加密規格，可 World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 在從http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/。For more information about XML encryption standards, see the XML Encryption specification, which is available from the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) at http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用時加密 XML 文件的物件。The following code example demonstrates how to use a object while encrypting an XML document. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式建立的新執行個體類別，表示``項目，使用提供的統一資源識別元 (URI)。This constructor creates a new instance of the class that represents the `` element, using the supplied Uniform Resource Identifier (URI). 此 URI 表示加密金鑰的位置。The URI indicates the location of the encrypted key. `` 項目是 `` 項目的子項目。The `` element is a child element of the `` element. 如需 XML 加密標準的詳細資訊，請參閱 XML 加密規格，可 World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 在從http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/。For more information about XML encryption standards, see the XML Encryption specification, which is available from the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) at http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用時加密 XML 文件的物件。The following code example demonstrates how to use a object while encrypting an XML document. summary.span: 初始化的新執行個體類別使用指定的統一資源識別元 (URI) 的 XML 加密和物件。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class for XML encryption using the specified Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) and a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式建立的新執行個體類別，表示``項目，使用提供的統一資源識別元 (URI) 和轉換鏈結。This constructor creates a new instance of the class that represents the `` element, using the supplied Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) and transform chain. 此 URI 表示加密的金鑰和可包含 XPath 轉換、 解壓縮轉換或有關如何擷取文件儲存體功能中的加密的資料的轉換鏈結的位置。The URI indicates the location of the encrypted key and the transform chain that can contain XPath transforms, decompression transforms, or information on how to retrieve the encrypted data from a document storage facility. `` 項目是 `` 項目的子項目。The `` element is a child element of the `` element. 如需 XML 加密標準的詳細資訊，請參閱 XML 加密規格，可 World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 在從http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/。For more information about XML encryption standards, see the XML Encryption specification, which is available from the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) at http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/.
